text:
Urbana, Illinois
March 16, 1954
Mr. John DeProspo
Executive Officer
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York, 7, N. Y.
Dear Johns
Check which I had intended to enclose with letter
last week (for Miss Citowits) is here enclosed.
Please accept my apologies. Please extend my
apologies to Miss Citowitfc. (I apologized to Si via 1 phone)
Also, please tell Si v*efll re cord Arthur Beater
tomorrow, mail him tape tomorrow.
I trust this is enough penance for one day.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
Treasurer
